#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define NL printf("\n")
#define mem(a,b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))
#define ft first
#define sd second
using namespace std;
const ll mod = 1000000007;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
int main(){
    //printf("Hello World..!\n");
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        char s[105], need[105];
        cin>>s;
        int n=strlen(s);
        for(int i=0;i<105;i++){
            need[i]='N';
        }
        int ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(s[i]!=need[i])
                ans++;
        }
        int tmp=0;
        for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
            need[j]='O';
            tmp=0;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(s[i]!=need[i])
                tmp++;
            }
            ans=min(ans, tmp);
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
